crimeSpotted.text: Hey! What do you think you are doing?
You! I saw that! You will get it now!
Well, well, well, if it isn't another dirty criminal. Prepare to be stopped, criminal!
Well that was most certainly not nice, and neither is the the thing I am now going to do to you.
You will pay for this, you scum!
A-ha! You think I am blind? You will get some!
Curse you, brigand! You will now taste my wrath!
Another day, another criminal stopped. Have at thee!
You cannot do that here! Not under my watch!
